name: Gallows
description: A place of public execution and justice; adventurers might witness executions, rescue condemned prisoners, or find evidence of wrongful convictions.
atmosphere: The area has a grim, somber atmosphere with the weight of death and justice hanging in the air. The scent of fear and the metallic tang of finality creates a heavy, oppressive feeling. The atmosphere crackles with the tension of life and death decisions and the harsh reality of capital punishment.
